scripts.reset: npm run clean && npm run setup
scripts.build-contracts: rm -rf ./.soroban/crowdfund-contract && rm -rf ./.soroban/abundance-token && ./target/bin/soroban contract bindings typescript --wasm ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/soroban_crowdfund_contract.wasm --id $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/crowdfund_id) --rpc-url $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/rpc-url) --network-passphrase "$(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/passphrase)" --output-dir ./.soroban/crowdfund-contract --contract-name crowdfund-contract && ./target/bin/soroban contract bindings typescript --wasm ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/abundance_token.wasm --id $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/abundance_token_id) --rpc-url $(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/rpc-url) --network-passphrase "$(cat ./.soroban-example-dapp/passphrase)" --output-dir ./.soroban/abundance-token --contract-name abundance-token
